articles.title: Connie Francis, ‘Who’s Sorry Now’ Singer, Dies at 87 - Billboard
articles.description: Connie Francis, a pop star of the late 1950s and early 1960s known for hits such as 'Who's Sorry Now,' has died at 87 due to undisclosed causes.
